cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum like 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper system logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the PRACH msg1 FDM to 10 is out of the valid range (0-3) and may cause RACH configuration failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 PRACH msg1 FDM 設定為 10 超出有效範圍 (0-3)，可能導致 RACH 配置失敗。
